QuestData.Title: Let the Healing Begin
QuestData.Description:
Do you think you would be able to step into this city without me noticing? No!
I was right about your kind before and I'll be damned before I let dragons destroy my home again.
This once was a park filled with joy and peace. Then your progenitor, Deathwing, came. Oh yes, I know all about him.
See for yourself the legacy of destruction that was left behind. The pain that walks these streets still.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help the people of Stormwind heal.

Objectives.Objective: Heal the night elves with Emerald Blossom
Heal Knight-Captain Sanine with Living Flame
